CustomField.description: To differentiate CPQ quotes from SWX Quotes
CustomField.formula: IF( Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__c != null, IF( AND( OR( Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.RecordType.Name = 'Create Direct Sales Opportunity', Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.RecordType.Name = 'Read Only Direct' ), isCQ__c = false ), IF( OR( RecordTypeId = $Label.DS_QuoteEditRecordTypeId, RecordTypeId = $Label.DS_QuoteReadRecordTypeId ) , 'Direct DS', IF(OR( RecordTypeId = $Label.NokiaCPQ_DirectQuoteID,RecordTypeId = $Label.NokiaCPQ_DirectReadOnlyQuoteID) , 'Direct CPQ', 'NCQ') ), IF( AND( OR( Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.RecordType.Name = 'Create Indirect Sales Opportunity', Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.RecordType.Name = 'Create Indirect Workspace Opportunity', Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.RecordType.Name = 'Read Only Indirect' ), isCQ__c = false ), IF( OR( RecordTypeId = $Label.DS_QuoteEditRecordTypeId , RecordTypeId = $Label.DS_QuoteReadRecordTypeId), 'Indirect DS', 'Indirect CPQ' ), IF(isCQ__c,'CQ','') ) ), '' )
CustomField.label: Quote Type
